title: intl linking error in OS X Yosemite when manually building

content.raw:
I have an issue when building gazebo6 "manually" from source. 
I have installed gazebo dependencies using brew with : 
```
brew install `brew deps --skip-optional --1 gazebo6 | sed -e ':a' -e 'N' -e '$!ba' -e 's/\n/ /g'`
```

Then I try to build the gazebo6 branch, but I get a linking error:
```
Silvios-iMac:build traversaro$ make 
[  0%] Built target gazebo_opende_ou
[  1%] Built target gazebo_gimpact
[  5%] Built target gazebo_opcode
[ 13%] Built target gazebo_ode
[ 14%] Built target gazebo_math
[ 18%] Built target gazebo_common
[ 18%] Built target gazebomsgs_out
[ 18%] Linking CXX shared library libgazebo_msgs.dylib
ld: library not found for -lintl
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [gazebo/msgs/libgazebo_msgs.6.1.0.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

The packages installed by brew are:

```
Silvios-iMac:~ traversaro$ brew list
ace		boost		doxygen		freetype	giflib		ignition-math	jpeg		libgeotiff	libtiff		lzlib		ogre		protobuf-c	sdl		tbb		veclibfort
asl		brew-cask	eigen		freexl		glib		ignition-math2	json-c		liblwgeom	libtool		mercurial	open-mpi	qt		sdl_gfx		tinyxml		webp
assimp		bullet		fcl		gcc		gmp		ipopt		lame		libmpc		libvo-aacenc	mpfr		openssl		qt5		sdl_image	tinyxml2	x264
autoconf	cmake		ffmpeg		gdal		gsl		isl		libccd		libpng		libxml2		mumps		pkg-config	readline	simbody		urdfdom		xvid
automake	console_bridge	flann		geos		gts		iwyu		libevent	libspatialite	libzzip		netpbm		proj		scalapack	sqlite		urdfdom_headers
bash-completion	dartsim4	freeimage	gettext		hdf5		jasper		libffi		libtar		lua		ode		protobuf	sdformat3	szip		valgrind
```

If I try to compile gazebo6 with brew, everything works fine.
content.html:
I have an issue when building gazebo6 "manually" from source. I have installed gazebo dependencies using brew with : 

brew install `brew deps --skip-optional --1 gazebo6 | sed -e ':a' -e 'N' -e '$!ba' -e 's/\n/ /g'`

Then I try to build the gazebo6 branch, but I get a linking error:

Silvios-iMac:build traversaro$ make 
[  0%] Built target gazebo_opende_ou
[  1%] Built target gazebo_gimpact
[  5%] Built target gazebo_opcode
[ 13%] Built target gazebo_ode
[ 14%] Built target gazebo_math
[ 18%] Built target gazebo_common
[ 18%] Built target gazebomsgs_out
[ 18%] Linking CXX shared library libgazebo_msgs.dylib
ld: library not found for -lintl
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [gazebo/msgs/libgazebo_msgs.6.1.0.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

The packages installed by brew are:

Silvios-iMac:~ traversaro$ brew list
ace     boost       doxygen     freetype    giflib      ignition-math   jpeg        libgeotiff  libtiff     lzlib       ogre        protobuf-c  sdl     tbb     veclibfort
asl     brew-cask   eigen       freexl      glib        ignition-math2  json-c      liblwgeom   libtool     mercurial   open-mpi    qt      sdl_gfx     tinyxml     webp
assimp      bullet      fcl     gcc     gmp     ipopt       lame        libmpc      libvo-aacenc    mpfr        openssl     qt5     sdl_image   tinyxml2    x264
autoconf    cmake       ffmpeg      gdal        gsl     isl     libccd      libpng      libxml2     mumps       pkg-config  readline    simbody     urdfdom     xvid
automake    console_bridge  flann       geos        gts     iwyu        libevent    libspatialite   libzzip     netpbm      proj        scalapack   sqlite      urdfdom_headers
bash-completion dartsim4    freeimage   gettext     hdf5        jasper      libffi      libtar      lua     ode     protobuf    sdformat3   szip        valgrind

If I try to compile gazebo6 with brew, everything works fine.
